DeleteFile.name: DeleteFile

SaveToFile.code:
class SaveToFile:
    def __init__(self, filepath, content):
        import os
        filepath = os.environ['PIPE_BASE'] + filepath
        f = open(filepath, "w")
        f.write(content)
        f.close()
        self.filepath = filepath
